description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，汉族，中国共产党党员。第十三届全国人民代表大会湖南地区代表。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, of Han ethnicity, and a member of the Communist Party of China. He is a deputy from the Hunan region to the 13th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的省份。
description.en: A province of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国湖南省永州市下辖的一个县。
description.en: A county under the jurisdiction of Yongzhou City, Hunan Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国的多数民族，也是世界上最大的民族。
description.en: The majority ethnic group in China and the largest ethnic group in the world.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的创立者和唯一执政党。
description.en: The founder and sole ruling party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚的社会主义国家，通常简称为中国。
description.en: A socialist state in East Asia, commonly known as China.

nodes.id: 第十三届全国人民代表大会

zh-cn: 第十三届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的第十三届国家最高权力机关，任期为2018年至2023年。
description.en: The 13th national legislature of the People's Republic of China, with a term from 2018 to 2023.

description.zh-cn: 根据维基百科页面信息，廖仁旺是湖南蓝山人。
description.en: According to the Wikipedia page, Liao Renwang is from Lanshan, Hunan.
Liao Renwang is of Han ethnicity.

description.zh-cn: 廖仁旺是中国共产党党员。
description.en: Liao Renwang is a member of the Communist Party of China.

relationships.target: 第十三届全国人民代表大会

position.zh-cn: 全国人大代表（湖南地区）
position.en: Deputy to the National People's Congress (Hunan region)

description.zh-cn: 2018年2月24日，廖仁旺当选为第十三届全国人民代表大会湖南地区代表。
description.en: On February 24, 2018, Liao Renwang was elected as a deputy from the Hunan region to the 13th National People's Congress.
